ProductInfo.Features:
Built in Android 4.2.2 Jelly Bean Operating System, better reliability and compatibility, Pre-installed Google Play,Amazon Kindle, Kids mode, Netflix, Smart office, Subway Surfers and support tens of thousands of software upgraded.
Adopt high performance Dual-core ARM Cortex A9-high-end processor, CPU can reach up to 1.3GHz, 1GB DDR3 internal memory, The sensitive reaction speed, bring you very cool new experience.
5 point capacitive touch screen for easy operation, 7 inch 1024*600 HD TFT display for beautiful pictures.
Build-in Dual-core GPU SGX540 (2D/3D graphic processor unit),support OpenGLES2.0/1.1 and OpenVG1.1,support 3D game perfectly..Mini HDMI port, 2160P(3840*2160) decode
Package including: 1 x AGPtek tablet, 1 x Charger with a USB Cable, 1 x Micro USB to USB(OTG) Cable, 1 x AGPtek User Manual
ProductInfo.Name: AGPtek® 7" Android 4.2 1GB RAM 4GB Storage Dual Core Tablet PC 1024*600 Capacitive Touch Screen with HDMI (Pre-installed Google Play, Amazon Kindle, Kids mode, Netflix, Smart office)
